func

protected Vector2f func(float time)
Calculates point , according to current time and coefficients of polynom

Parameters:
time - - current time
shift - - all coordinates will be shifted by this value
Returns:
- point of the curve

generateSplittedCurve

public int generateSplittedCurve(float splitLength)

getTangent

public Vector2f getTangent(float position,
                           float precision)
Calculates tanget in the current point of the curve. Point is described by length from curve's begin. Gut Precision is 0.01f;

Parameters:
position - - distance from curve's begin
precision - - precision of the calculation, must be in range (0,1)
Returns:
tangent vector

getTangent

public Vector2f getTangent(float position)
Calculates tangent in the current point of the curve. Point is described by length from curve's begin

Parameters:
position - - distance from curve's begin
Returns:
- tangent vector
